GALLERY

Maison Olive

(Can accommodate up to 4)
  • Sunny Master Bedroom w/ Ensuite Shower room

The open-plan layout gives Maison Olive a light, airy, almost ‘beach house’ feel, and with 2 bedrooms it can accommodate up to 4 people. It has a lovely high ceilinged fully equipped kitchen, dining area opening onto a very large private terrace and a cosy lounge area with wood burning stove.

Upstairs at the front of the house is a sunny master bedroom with ensuite shower room, it has large french windows with wrought iron balastrade overlooking the lawn, countryside and mountains beyond. At the rear of the house is a twin room and separate bathroom.

The shaded sun terrace is furnished with dining table and six chairs, sun loungers and gas BBQ.

RATES
7th May - 28th May €1500
28th May - 2nd Jul €1900
2nd Jul - 3rd Sep €2850
3rd Sep - 2nd Oct €1900

SPECIAL OFFER

Book between April-May for 25% off

Maison Citron

(Can accommodate up to 6)
  • Twin bedroom with french windows

Cool, airy and spacious, this house boasts three good size bedrooms, sleeping a total of 6 people. It is also possible to connect at goundfloor level with Maison Figue if required and the terrace has a cleverly designed division that can be opened to join the two terraces together, thus creating one large house and terrace to share with friends and family.

The groundfloor is spacious and semi-open plan with a fully equipped kitchen, dining area with table seating six and a comfortable lounge area with wood burning stove. Two large glass doors open directly onto the shaded terrace which overlooks the gardens and takes in the view of the Pyrénees.

Upstairs is a large master bedroom that has french windows with wrought iron balastrade, opening to reveal the beautiful view and ensuite with wet room style shower. There is a spacious twin bedroom also with french windows, a third bedroom sleeping two in bunkbeds and a large bright family bathroom.

RATES
7th May - 28th May €1800
28th May - 2nd Jul €2250
2nd Jul - 3rd Sep €3150
3rd Sep - 2nd Oct €2250

SPECIAL OFFER

Book between April-May for 25% off

GALLERY

Maison Figue

(Can accommodate up to 5)
  • Master bedroom w/ king size bed + ensuite wet room

This beautiful three bedroomed house can accommodate up to 5 people, the groundfloor and the terrace inter-connect with Maison Citron if required, thus creating a very large 6 bedroom house.

Downstairs you will find perfectly arranged open plan living space, opening onto a large shaded private terrace with table & chairs, gas BBQ and far-reaching views of the Pyrenees. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher, 5 ring gas range, washing machine, microwave and large fridge-freezer. The dining area boasts a large zinc top table which seats six, there is also a comfortable lounge area with wood burning stove.

Upstairs comprises three good sized bedrooms; master bedroom with king size bed and ensuite with wet-room style shower, one twin bedroom, one single bedroom and a bathroom. Both master and twin bedrooms have french windows with wrought iron balastrade opening to reveal views of the uninterrupted countryside and gardens.

RATES
7th May - 28th May €1700
28th May - 2nd Jul €2150
2nd Jul - 3rd Sep €3000
3rd Sep - 2nd Oct €2150

SPECIAL OFFER

Book between April-May for 25% off

GALLERY

Maison Cypres

(Can accommodate up to 8)
  • 2 stylish master bedrooms w/ King size bed, ensuite and wet room

This very spacious house with high ceilings and masses of natural light, has four bedrooms and can accommodate up to 8 people. Huge french windows open to wonderful views of the countryside and mountains, making a perfect spot to enjoy an aperitif. Alternatively, a large terrace to the rear of the property reveals a picturesque view of the hilltop village of Montréal, a sunny spot to enjoy a lazy breakfast or dinner while the village is lit up at night time.

The large, fully equipped kitchen opens onto the dining room which has a zinc topped table seating 8 people, there is also a spacious comfortable lounge with a wood burning stove.

Upstairs you will find two stylish master bedrooms each with king size bed & ensuite including wet room style showers, a twin bedded room, a bedroom with bunkbeds and a family bathroom with sunken bath.

RATES
7th May - 28th May €2200
28th May - 2nd Jul €2950
2nd Jul - 3rd Sep €3700
3rd Sep - 2nd Oct €2950

SPECIAL OFFER

Book between April-May for 25% off
